name: Google Surface 3D Dark Mode Neomorphism UI
description:
Release Version of Dark Mode Google Surface. Google Surface is a neumorphism / neomorphic redesign of Google search which incorporates shadows and gradients. Neumorphic / Neomorphic panels cover the site and make it feel 3D. This theme is the ultimate modern redesign of Google Dark Mode.
-----
Report all errors and issues to RG form
https://forms.office.com/r/sAYTdrg8wn
